title: Why is the Korean pop music gaining popularity worldwide? - Quora

response.answer_text: You have to have a fairly liberal and open-mind to embrace and accept a foreign culture. But K-Pop is able to overcome language and cultural barriers because it is simply appealing to many. It may not be as popular in Western countries but its popularity should not be underestimated. In fact, some Korean acts have recently landed near the top of the Billboard Hot 100 which has never been done since the PSY era. How Korean Boy Band BTS Broke a U.S. K-pop Chart Record – Without Any Songs In English Furthermore, KCON (music festival) - Wikipedia is held worldwide including the US and has been a huge success since 2012 as attendance continues to grow exponentially every year. Another strong indication of K-Pops global popularity is the addition of a K-Pop genre on Itunes. K-pop is already popular in Asia, but the fact that Apple made a K-pop genre on Itunes speaks volumes. Also, it’s not rare to see Korean artists consistently landing the #1 or #2 spot on the Worldwide Itunes album charts in multiple countries [UPDATE] BTS Wings is 1st at the United States Itunes Album chart, they are n1 in 27 countries - Charts and Sales. In conclusion, K-Pop is slowly but surely making progress in the US market. Everyday, K-Pop is gaining more popularity through social media and YouTube. Saying it’s not warrants a little more objective research.
